title: Broccoli soup
ingredients: ['1 litre chicken or vegetable stock', '600g broccoli, cut into florets and stalks chopped', '1 onion, roughly chopped', '2 garlic cloves, crushed', '2 tbsp long-grain rice', '2 tbsp crème fraîche', '1 tbsp flaked almonds, toasted', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
